Body: Usually the origins of the word "addict" are referred to Latin. Once I read somewhere that such word could have greek roots, from "diké", justice, rights. Something like "adiktoi" could mean "those not entitled to rights", therefore slaves. It makes some sense, at least. Where could we find support to trust or to distrust such claims?
Title: What is the history of the word "addict"?
